page.title: 09TRANSPORT
page.content: A{bus service}operates from Sheepy Magna to the nearby town of Atherstone on Tuesday and Friday, market day.On Wednesdays there is a bus service to the city of Leicester and on Saturdays three services operate to the town of Nuneaton.The Wednesday and Saturday buses serve Sheepy Magna, Sheepy Parva and Sibson.The villages are situated about 20miles from Birmingham International and the East Midlands {Airports.}The nearest{railway stations are about 6-8miles away at Nuneaton or Tamworth.The area has easy access by road to the major towns of the Midlands.The{M42}(at present under construction) passes nearby and will give better access to the main motorways in the area e.g.M1 and M6. Because of the lack of public transport the residents of this area are dependent upon the motor car.
